faq.question: What are the opening hours of Barbeque Nation in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Barbeque Nation Bangalore is open from 12:00 PM to 3:30 PM for lunch and 6:30 PM to 11:30 PM for dinner, seven days a week.

faq.question: What is the price of the buffet at Barbeque Nation Bangalore?
faq.answer: The buffet at Barbeque Nation Bangalore costs ₹749 per person (plus taxes) for lunch on weekdays, ₹849 for lunch on weekends, and ₹949 for dinner every day. Children between 4-8 years are charged at 60% of the adult price.

faq.question: Where is Barbeque Nation located in Bangalore?
faq.answer: Barbeque Nation has multiple outlets in Bangalore. Our main branches are at: 1) Indiranagar - 100 Feet Road, 2) Koramangala - 80 Feet Road, 3) Whitefield - Phoenix Marketcity Mall, 4) JP Nagar - 3rd Phase, 5) Electronic City - Phase 1.

faq.question: Do I need to make a reservation at Barbeque Nation Bangalore?
faq.answer: While walk-ins are welcome, we recommend making a reservation, especially for weekends and holidays, to avoid waiting. You can book a table through our website, mobile app, or by calling the restaurant directly.

faq.question: Is there a vegetarian menu at Barbeque Nation Bangalore?
faq.answer: Yes, Barbeque Nation Bangalore offers an extensive vegetarian menu with a variety of starters, main courses, and desserts. We have separate grilling stations for vegetarian and non-vegetarian items.

faq.question: What special offers are available at Barbeque Nation Bangalore?
faq.answer: We offer a 15% discount for lunch on weekdays, special rates for birthday celebrations, and a 10% discount for senior citizens. We also have seasonal festivals with special menus throughout the year.

booking.details: To book a table at any of our Bangalore outlets, please provide the following information: 1) Preferred date and time, 2) Number of guests, 3) Contact number, 4) Special requests if any. Our Bangalore outlets can accommodate groups of up to 50 people with prior reservation.

Indiranagar: 130 seats, Koramangala: 110 seats, Whitefield: 120 seats, JP Nagar: 90 seats, Electronic City: 100 seats. For large group bookings (more than 15 people), please book at least 2 days in advance.

We can arrange special decorations for birthday and anniversary celebrations with 24 hours notice. Please mention your requirements while booking. A cake cutting charge of ₹200 applies if you bring your own cake.
